/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the street, trees stand tall, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with streetlights that would illuminate the area as dusk falls. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, and a few pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in this bustling city.
